name: jquery-migrate
title: jQuery Migrate
description: Migrate older jQuery code to jQuery 4.x

scripts.start: node --input-type=module -e "import { buildDefaultFiles } from './build/tasks/build.js'; buildDefaultFiles({ watch: true })"
scripts.test:browser: npm run pretest && npm run build:all && npm run test:unit -- -b chrome -b firefox --headless
scripts.test:browserless: npm run pretest && npm run build:all && node test/bundler_smoke_tests/run-jsdom-tests.js && node test/node_smoke_tests/node_smoke_tests.cjs
scripts.test:ie: npm run pretest && npm run build:all && npm run test:unit -- -v -b ie
scripts.test:bundlers: npm run pretest && npm run build:all && node test/bundler_smoke_tests/run-jsdom-tests.js
scripts.test:node_smoke_tests: npm run pretest && npm run build:all && node test/node_smoke_tests/node_smoke_tests.cjs
scripts.test:safari: npm run pretest && npm run build:all && npm run test:unit -- -v -b safari
scripts.test:esm: npm run pretest && npm run build:main && npm run test:unit -- -f plugin=esmodules --headless
scripts.test: npm run build:all && npm run lint && npm run test:browserless && npm run test:browser && npm run test:esm
